TITLE: Updating BottomSheetBackdrop Default Props in React Native
DESCRIPTION: This code updates the default props for the BottomSheetBackdrop component in React Native, handling 'falsey' values correctly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/react-native-bottom-sheet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
BottomSheetBackdrop.defaultProps = {
  appearsOnIndex: 1,
  disappearsOnIndex: 0,
  opacity: 0.5,
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Handle Height in React Native Bottom Sheet
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet updates the handle height in the React Native Bottom Sheet component to avoid race conditions. It uses the setImmediate function to ensure the height is always updated.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/react-native-bottom-sheet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
setImmediate(() => {
  animatedHandleHeight.value = handleHeight;
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Container Height in React Native Bottom Sheet
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet updates the container height in the React Native Bottom Sheet component to avoid race conditions. It uses the setImmediate function to ensure the height is always updated.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/react-native-bottom-sheet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
setImmediate(() => {
  animatedContainerHeight.value = nextContainerHeight;
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Exporting Internal Hooks in React Native Bottom Sheet
DESCRIPTION: This code exports internal hooks from the React Native Bottom Sheet library, allowing for unsafe usage of useBottomSheetInternal and useBottomSheetModalInternal hooks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/react-native-bottom-sheet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
export { useBottomSheetInternal, useBottomSheetModalInternal };
```

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies with Yarn Bootstrap
DESCRIPTION: Command to install required dependencies for each package in the project. This is the first step in the development workflow.
SOURCE: https://github.com/bluesky-social/react-native-bottom-sheet/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn bootstrap
```
